Header: New Director Training Takes up Duties
Content: Brigadier Nishantha Herath took up duties as the new Director Training of the Sri Lanka Army this morning (20) at the Army Headquarters in Sri Jayewardenepura. Amid ‘Pirith’ chanting of the members of Maha Sangha, the new Director Training signified the acceptance of his office at the auspicious minute. Staff Officers of the Directorate and Other Ranks attended the occasion.
